content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between two parties whose names are not provided the court determined that one party will own a vaz 21063 vehicle while the other party will own a ford windstar vehicle the applicant has been declared the owner of the ford windstar and has the right to use it as well as the right to possess a ford taurus x the applicant is responsible for any obligations related to the use of the ford windstar the text also mentions a specific article in the civil code that protects the rights of creditors the applicant filed a legal action seeking the dissolution of their marriage citing reasons such as the defendants failure to pay spousal maintenance and negative behavior the court granted the applicants requests for the dissolution of the marriage spousal maintenance and the retention of the applicants surname the court will also decide on the division of joint property and address any outstanding obligations to creditors the defendant objected to the allocation of one of the vehicles but the court granted the applicants request the defendant is responsible for the costs of the proceedings the court is in the process of dividing the property and rights acquired during the marriage including a vehicle called ford windstar the applicant claims ownership and the right to use the vehicle and the defendant is ordered to pay postage costs
